main event: Two bright objects were observed over Ft Belvoir, Virginia on December 16, 1953, likely identified as sun dogs.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 45 minutes,Three military witnesses confirmed seeing the objects,The objects were described as having no definite shape and exhibiting short jerky movements, The observed colors changed during the sighting, The objects were not bright enough to outshine the stars.
sighted object: two bright objects in the sky
witness description: members of the 515th Engineer Pipeline Company
